# AVPlayerItemErrorLogEvent

**Class**

A single item in a player item’s error log.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVPlayerItemErrorLogEvent
```

## Overview

This object provides properties for accessing the data fields of each log event. Each event is a single entry in an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem] object’s error log.

These properties aren’t observable. For more information about key-value observing, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/using-key-value-observing-in-swift].

## Getting information about the event

- **date**: The date and time when the error occurred.
- **uri**: The URI of the playback item that had an error.
- **serverAddress**: The IP address of the server that was the source of the error.
- **playbackSessionID**: A GUID that identifies the playback session that had an error.
- **errorStatusCode**: A unique error code identifier.
- **errorDomain**: The domain of the error.
- **errorComment**: A description of the error encountered.
- **allHTTPResponseHeaderFields**: The HTTP header fields the server returns.

## Accessing logging information

- **accessLog()**: Returns an object that represents a snapshot of the network access log.
- **AVPlayerItemAccessLog**: An object used to retrieve the access log associated with a player item.
- **AVPlayerItemAccessLogEvent**: A single entry in a player item’s access log.
- **errorLog()**: Returns an object that represents a snapshot of the error log.
- **AVPlayerItemErrorLog**: The error log associated with a player item.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
